dct_title_s: De Grondt en Vloer vande Groote Burger Sael
dct_description_sm: California shown as an unlabeled island with a deeply indented northern coast. California widens significantly in northern half.
Shows Tasman's discoveries on Australian continent.
Includes a celestial chart, 9.5 cm. in diam., between the 2 hemispheres.
Maps overlaid on floor plan. Floor plan includes a legend below title at bottom.
Plate 'O' or 14th from first ed. of Jacob van Campen's Abfeelding van't Stadt Huys van Amsterdam depicting the world map laid in marble floor of Amsterdam Town Hall.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
